mapper.select: SELECT a.NUMBER, a.GPSTIME AS TIME, a.SYSID AS SYSTEMID, b.`LEVEL`, b.CONTENTC AS descriptionC, b.CONTENTE AS descriptionE, b.BRAND, b.SOLUTION, b.SENSORS FROM fault a INNER JOIN faultcode b ON a.MODEID = b.MODEID AND a.CODE1=b.CODE1 AND a.CODE2=b.CODE2 AND a.CODE3 = b.CODE3 WHERE a.NUMBER=? AND a.GPSTIME BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY a.GPSTIME
